metadata.summary: Configure cloud-to-cloud adapter to ingest real-time messages from Google Cloud Pub/Sub subscriptions into LimaCharlie
metadata.primary_use_case: Stream real-time security events and logs from GCP Pub/Sub into LimaCharlie for immediate processing

extracted_apis.description: Configure Pub/Sub adapter with subscription, project, and credentials

GCP project ID where the Pub/Sub subscription exists
Reference to hive secret containing GCP service account credentials
Optional buffer size in bytes for Pub/Sub message handling
